Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- More -->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```
More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

## Unit Tests
### Try to insert an equation
$$ X = \frac{1}{Y} \mathcal{Q}(S) $$

### Quote test
{% blockquote Andrej Karparphy http://karpathy.github.io/2016/05/31/rl/ %}
RL is hot!
{% endblockquote %}

### Code test
{% codeblock lang:python %}
import pandas as pd
import gym
{% endcodeblock %}

### Quote test2
>I've said that it needs more practice.

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

<!-- More -->

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

$$ X = \frac{1}{Y} \mathcal{Q}(S) $$

{% blockquote Andrej Karparphy http://karpathy.github.io/2016/05/31/rl/ %}
RL is hot!
{% endblockquote %}

### Code test
{% codeblock lang:python %}
import pandas as pd
import gym
{% endcodeblock %}

### Quote test2
>I've said that it needs more practice.

Post.title: DRLThird-Person Imitation Learning Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning
Post._content: # paper~ ICLR2017DRLinsights ICLRreviewerauthorjournalDRLDeepmindOpenAIDRLpaperfollow --- ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/iclr_imitation_learning_title.png) > GANRL (TRPO) GANRL --- # ["Third-Person Imitation Learning"](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.01703.pdf) [1]OpenAIPieter AbbeelIlya Sutskever(imitation learning)imitation learningagentfancy ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/title.jpg "") Generative Adversarial Network (GAN)Imitation Learning **GAN** **RL** GAN paper1) imitation learning; 2) ["Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning"](http://papers.nips.cc/paper/6391-generative-adversarial-imitation-learning.pdf) (NIPS 16OpenAIJonathan HoStefano Ermon) [2] --- # Imitation Learning > [2] * (learner)(expert)(trajactory) * learnerexpert * Learner(reward signal) {$\tau_E$} $< s_1^i,a_1^i,s_2^i,a_2^2,...,s_n^i>$-featurelabel- imitation learningsupervised learning-learner(policy) **Behavioral Cloning**supervised learningRNN (LSTM)Structural SVM, CRFsupervised learningagentBehavioral Cloning ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/aggreg_error.png "") ** IRL (Inverse Reinforcement Learning) **cost functioncost function(Reinforcement Learning)agentenvironment[2]IRLReinforcement learningscalability --- # GAIL (Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning) [2]IRLRLpolicy gradient ## IRL Inverse Reinforcement LearningRLrewardcost - $\mathcal{S}$$\mathcal{A}$ - $s\rightarrow s'$$P(s'|s,a)$ - $\pi_E$$\pi$ - cost function $c(s,a)$$c(s,a)$learnercostcost - $ \mathbb{E}_{\pi}[c(s,a)] \triangleq \mathbb{E}[\sum_{t=0}^\infty \gamma^t c(s_t,a_t)] $$\pi$total discounted costRLvalue function. IRL: > $$ \max_{c\in \mathbb{C}} \big(\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi) + \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] \big) - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)] $$ OKobjective function - cost function $c$reward(cost)expert trajactorieslearner trajactoriescmax costInverse RLreward(cost) - learner$\pi$cost function - $H(\pi)$ * $\gamma$-discounted casusal entropy*$H(\pi)\triangleq \mathbb{E}\pi [-\log \pi(a|s)]$supervised learningsfeaturealabel $c$IRLinner loopRLcost function $$ RL(c)=\arg\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi)+\mathbb{E}_{\pi}[c(s,a)] $$ > IRLlearner$\pi$expert$c$expertlearner *GAN* GAILIRLGANneural networkImitation LearningGAN Abbeel and Ng Syed(Apprenticeship learning) ## IRLgeneral - IRLcost function $c$overfitregularizer $\psi$IRL $$ IRL_{\psi}(\pi_E) = \arg\max_{c\in\mathbb{R}^{\mathcal{S}\times \mathcal{A}}} -\psi(c) + \big(\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi) + \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] \big) - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E}[c(s,a)]$$ - occupancy measure $\rho_{\pi}: \mathcal{S}\times\mathcal{A}\rightarrow\mathbb{R}$ $\rho_{\pi}(s,a)=\pi(a|s)\sum_{t=0}^{\infty}\gamma^t P(s_t=s|\pi)$$\pi$-$< s,a>$IRLImitation learning $$ RL\circ IRL_{\psi}(\pi_E) = \arg\min_{\pi \in \Pi} - H(\pi)+\psi^*(\rho_{\pi} - \rho_{\pi_E})$$ IRL$\pi$-(occupancy measure)-$\psi^*$(convex conjugate) - (Apprenticeship learning)$\psi$indicator function $\psi=\delta_{\mathcal{C}}$$\delta_{\mathcal{C}}(c)=0$ if $c\in\mathcal{C}$, and $\infty$ otherwise $$ \min_{\pi} \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)]$$ $\delta_{\mathcal{C}}$ $$ \min_{\pi} -H(\pi)+ \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)]$$ - RL**policy gradient** $\theta$$\pi_{\theta}$$\theta$ $$\nabla_{\theta} \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}}[c(s,a)]$$ $\hat{c}=\arg\max_{c\in\mathcal{C}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}}[c(s,a)]$, $Q_{\hat{c}}(s,a)=\mathbb{E_{\theta}}[\hat{c}(s,a)|s_0=s,a_0=a]$ $$ Left=\nabla_{\theta}\mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[\hat{c}(s,a)] = \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[\nabla_\theta\log \pi_{\theta}(a|s) Q_{\hat{c}}(s,a)]$$ policy gradient [Karpathyblog](http://karpathy.github.io/2016/05/31/rl/) - **1. $\pi_{\theta_i}$ $\hat{c}$ ;** **2. $\hat{c}$policy gradient$\pi_{\theta_{i+1}}$ .** > 1expertlearnercost function2cost functionlearner ## GAN OKGAN$\psi$GAN ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/equation13.png) $$\psi^*_{GA}(\rho_\pi - \rho_{\pi_E})-\lambda H(\pi) = \sup_{D\in (0,1)^{\mathcal{S}\times\mathcal{A}}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi}[\log(D(s,a))] + \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E}[\log(1-D(s,a))]-\lambda H(\pi)$$ ~ GANcost function $c(s,a)=\log D(s,a)$learner$D(s,a)\rightarrow 1$$c(s,a)$ **expert learnercost function ## GAIL GAN+Imitation Learning(IL)GAILpaper ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/algorithm_gail.png "GAIL") GANcost functionGAN$D_w(s,a)$ (line4)cost functionTRPO(Trust Region Policy Optimizationpolicy gradient)$\pi_\theta$ ## OpenAI kindlyGAILgithubhttps://github.com/openai/imitation --- # Third-Person Imitation Learning GAIL"Third-Person Imitation Learning"make it possible ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/third_title.png "Third-Person Imitation Learning ") GAILdomain differenceDeep Domain AdaptationGAILGANlayers$D_F$domainlayersexpert domain$D_R$ expertlearner$D_D$BPtrick $\mathcal{G}$$D_R, D_D, D_F$$\min$GAILTRPOpolicy gradient ![](/images/imitation_learning_paper/algorithm_third.png "Third-Person Imitation Learning ") --- # paper GAILcite GAIL - Deepmind["Connecting Generative Adversarial Networks and Actor-Critic Methods"](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1610.01945.pdf) GAN RLActor-Critic(AC) stabilizing GANACtrick - paper[multi-agent imitation learning](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.03121)multi-agent --- # blog"Third-Person Imitation Learning"Imitation LearningGANRLimitation learningGAIL take-away - IRLcost function $c$overfitregularizer $\psi$IRL $$ IRL_{\psi}(\pi_E) = \arg\max_{c\in\mathbb{R}^{\mathcal{S}\times \mathcal{A}}} -\psi(c) + \big(\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi) + \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] \big) - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E}[c(s,a)]$$ - occupancy measure $\rho_{\pi}: \mathcal{S}\times\mathcal{A}\rightarrow\mathbb{R}$ $\rho_{\pi}(s,a)=\pi(a|s)\sum_{t=0}^{\infty}\gamma^t P(s_t=s|\pi)$$\pi$-$< s,a>$IRLImitation learning $$ RL\circ IRL_{\psi}(\pi_E) = \arg\min_{\pi \in \Pi} - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)]$$ $\delta_{\mathcal{C}}$ $$ \min_{\pi} -H(\pi)+ \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)]$$ - RL**policy gradient** $\theta$$\pi_{\theta}$$\theta$ $$\nabla_{\theta} \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}}[c(s,a)]$$ $\hat{c}=\arg\max_{c\in\mathcal{C}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}}[c(s,a)]$, $Q_{\hat{c}}(s,a)=\mathbb{E_{\theta}}[\hat{c}(s,a)|s_0=s,a_0=a]$ $$ Left=\nabla_{\theta}\mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[\hat{c}(s,a)] = \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[\nabla_\theta\log \pi_{\theta}(a|s) Q_{\hat{c}}(s,a)]$$ policy gradient [Karpathyblog](http://karpathy.github.io/2016/05/31/rl/) - [2]IRLRLpolicy gradient

IRL

Inverse Reinforcement LearningRLrewardcost

  • $\mathcal{S}$$\mathcal{A}$
  • $s\rightarrow s$$P(s|s,a)$
  • $\pi_E$$\pi$
  • cost function $c(s,a)$$c(s,a)$learnercostcost
  • $ \mathbb{E}_{\pi}[c(s,a)] \triangleq \mathbb{E}[\sum_{t=0}^\infty \gamma^t c(s_t,a_t)] $$\pi$total discounted costRLvalue function.

IRL:

$$ \max_{c\in \mathbb{C}} \big(\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi) + \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] \big) - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)] $$

OKobjective function

  • cost function $c$reward(cost)expert trajactorieslearner trajactoriescmax costInverse RLreward(cost)
  • learner$\pi$cost function
  • $H(\pi)$ $\gamma$-discounted casusal entropy$H(\pi)\triangleq \mathbb{E}\pi [-\log \pi(a|s)]$supervised learningsfeaturealabel

$c$IRLinner loopRLcost function
$$ RL(c)=\arg\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi)+\mathbb{E}_{\pi}[c(s,a)] $$

IRLlearner$\pi$expert$c$expertlearner

GAN GAILIRLGANneural networkImitation LearningGAN Abbeel and Ng Syed(Apprenticeship learning)

IRLgeneral

  • IRLcost function $c$overfitregularizer $\psi$IRL
    $$ IRL_{\psi}(\pi_E) = \arg\max_{c\in\mathbb{R}^{\mathcal{S}\times \mathcal{A}}} -\psi(c) + \big(\min_{\pi \in \Pi} -H(\pi) + \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] \big) - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E}[c(s,a)]$$

  • occupancy measure $\rho_{\pi}: \mathcal{S}\times\mathcal{A}\rightarrow\mathbb{R}$ $\rho_{\pi}(s,a)=\pi(a|s)\sum_{t=0}^{\infty}\gamma^t P(s_t=s|\pi)$$\pi$-$< s,a>$IRLImitation learning
    $$ RL\circ IRL_{\psi}(\pi_E) = \arg\min_{\pi \in \Pi} - H(\pi)+\psi^*(\rho_{\pi} - \rho_{\pi_E})$$

IRL$\pi$-(occupancy measure)-$\psi^*$(convex conjugate)

  • (Apprenticeship learning)$\psi$indicator function $\psi=\delta_{\mathcal{C}}$$\delta_{\mathcal{C}}(c)=0$ if $c\in\mathcal{C}$, and $\infty$ otherwise

$$ \min_{\pi} \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)]$$

$\delta_{\mathcal{C}}$

$$ \min_{\pi} -H(\pi)+ \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi} [c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E} [c(s,a)]$$

  • RLpolicy gradient

$\theta$$\pi_{\theta}$$\theta$
$$\nabla_{\theta} \max_{c\in\mathcal{C}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}}[c(s,a)]$$
$\hat{c}=\arg\max_{c\in\mathcal{C}}\mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[c(s,a)] - \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{E}}[c(s,a)]$, $Q_{\hat{c}}(s,a)=\mathbb{E_{\theta}}[\hat{c}(s,a)|s_0=s,a_0=a]$

$$ Left=\nabla_{\theta}\mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[\hat{c}(s,a)] = \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\theta}}[\nabla_\theta\log \pi_{\theta}(a|s) Q_{\hat{c}}(s,a)]$$
policy gradient Karpathyblog


  • 1. $\pi_{\theta_i}$ $\hat{c}$ ;
    2. $\hat{c}$policy gradient$\pi_{\theta_{i+1}}$ .

$$\psi^*_{GA}(\rho_\pi - \rho_{\pi_E})-\lambda H(\pi) = \sup_{D\in (0,1)^{\mathcal{S}\times\mathcal{A}}} \mathbb{E}_{\pi}[\log(D(s,a))] + \mathbb{E}_{\pi_E}[\log(1-D(s,a))]-\lambda H(\pi)$$

~ GANcost function $c(s,a)=\log D(s,a)$learner$D(s,a)\rightarrow 1$$c(s,a)$ expert learnercost function
